extendedInfo.description: If you are Cyndi Lauper's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Cyndi Lauper's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Cyndi Lauper's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Cyndi Lauper's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)--------------------------------Main Features --------------------------------- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics--------------------------------List of albums --------------------------------- Blue Angel- She's So Unusual- True Colors- A Night to Remember- Hat Full of Stars- Sisters of Avalon- Merry Christmas... Have a Nice Life- At Last- Shine- Bring Ya to the Brink- Memphis Blues--------------------------------List of lyrics --------------------------------- 911- A Night To Remember- A Part Hate- All Through The Night- Anna Blue- At Last- Ballad Of Cleo And Joe- Boy Blue- Brimstone And Fire- Broken Glass- Calm Inside The Storm- Can't Blame Me- Change Of Heart- Christmas Conga- Comfort You-
